actions.name: CreateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to create an app

actions.name: CreateCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to create a campaign for an app

actions.name: CreateEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create an email template

actions.name: CreateExportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create an export job that exports endpoint definitions to Amazon S3

actions.name: CreateImportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to import endpoint definitions from to create a segment

actions.name: CreateInAppTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create an in-app message template

actions.name: CreateJourney
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Journey for an app

actions.name: CreatePushTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a push notification template

actions.name: CreateRecommenderConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

actions.name: CreateSegment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a segment that is based on endpoint data reported to Pinpoint by your app. To allow a user to create a segment by importing endpoint data from outside of Pinpoint, allow the mobiletargeting:CreateImportJob action

actions.name: CreateSmsTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create an sms message template

actions.name: CreateVoiceTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a voice message template

actions.name: DeleteAdmChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the ADM channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteApnsChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the APNs channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteApnsVoipChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the APNs VoIP channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteApnsVoipSandboxChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the APNs VoIP sandbox channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteApp
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specific campaign

actions.name: DeleteBaiduChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the Baidu channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specific campaign

actions.name: DeleteEmailChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the email channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an email template or an email template version

actions.name: DeleteEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an endpoint

actions.name: DeleteEventStream
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the event stream for an app

actions.name: DeleteGcmChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the GCM channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteInAppTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an in-app message template or an in-app message template version

actions.name: DeleteJourney
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specific journey

actions.name: DeletePushTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a push notification template or a push notification template version

actions.name: DeleteRecommenderConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

actions.name: DeleteSegment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specific segment

actions.name: DeleteSmsChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the SMS channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteSmsTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an sms message template or an sms message template version

actions.name: DeleteUserEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to delete all of the endpoints that are associated with a user ID

actions.name: DeleteVoiceChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the Voice channel for an app

actions.name: DeleteVoiceTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a voice message template or a voice message template version

actions.name: GetAdmChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Device Messaging (ADM) channel for an app

actions.name: GetApnsChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs channel for an app

actions.name: GetApnsSandboxChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs sandbox channel for an app

actions.name: GetApnsVoipChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs VoIP channel for an app

actions.name: GetApnsVoipSandboxChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the APNs VoIP sandbox channel for an app

actions.name: GetApp
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific app in your Amazon Pinpoint account

actions.name: GetApplicationDateRangeKpi
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard metric that applies to an application

actions.name: GetApplicationSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the default settings for an app

actions.name: GetApps
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of apps in your Amazon Pinpoint account

actions.name: GetBaiduChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Baidu channel for an app

actions.name: GetCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific campaign

actions.name: GetCampaignActivities
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the activities performed by a campaign

actions.name: GetCampaignDateRangeKpi
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard metric that applies to a campaign

actions.name: GetCampaignVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific campaign version

actions.name: GetCampaignVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the current and prior versions of a campaign

actions.name: GetCampaigns
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all campaigns for an app

actions.name: GetChannels
actions.description: Grants permission to get all channels information for your app

actions.name: GetEmailChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain information about the email channel in an app

actions.name: GetEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an email template

actions.name: GetEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific endpoint

actions.name: GetEventStream
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the event stream for an app

actions.name: GetExportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain information about a specific export job

actions.name: GetExportJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all of the export jobs for an app

actions.name: GetGcmChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the GCM channel for an app

actions.name: GetImportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific import job

actions.name: GetImportJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all import jobs for an app

actions.name: GetInAppMessages
actions.description: Grants permission to retrive in-app messages for the given endpoint id

actions.name: GetInAppTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an in-app message template

actions.name: GetJourney
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific journey

actions.name: GetJourneyDateRangeKpi
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard engagement metric that applies to a journey

actions.name: GetJourneyExecutionActivityMetrics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard execution metric that applies to a journey activity

actions.name: GetJourneyExecutionMetrics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard execution metric that applies to a journey

actions.name: GetJourneyRunExecutionActivityMetrics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard execution metric that applies to a journey activity for a single journey run

actions.name: GetJourneyRunExecutionMetrics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve (queries) pre-aggregated data for a standard execution metric that applies to a journey for a single journey run

actions.name: GetJourneyRuns
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all journey runs for a journey

actions.name: GetPushTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an push notification template

actions.name: GetRecommenderConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

actions.name: GetRecommenderConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all the recommender model configurations that are associated with an Amazon Pinpoint account

actions.name: GetReports
actions.description: Grants permission to mobiletargeting:GetReports

actions.name: GetSegment
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific segment

actions.name: GetSegmentExportJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about jobs that export endpoint definitions from segments to Amazon S3

actions.name: GetSegmentImportJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about jobs that create segments by importing endpoint definitions from

actions.name: GetSegmentVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific segment version

actions.name: GetSegmentVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the current and prior versions of a segment

actions.name: GetSegments
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the segments for an app

actions.name: GetSmsChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain information about the SMS channel in an app

actions.name: GetSmsTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of an sms message template

actions.name: GetUserEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the endpoints that are associated with a user ID

actions.name: GetVoiceChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain information about the Voice channel in an app

actions.name: GetVoiceTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific or the active version of a voice message template

actions.name: ListJourneys
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all journeys for an app

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

actions.name: ListTemplateVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all versions about a specific template

actions.name: ListTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about the queried templates

actions.name: PhoneNumberValidate
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain metadata for a phone number, such as the number type (mobile, landline, or VoIP), location, and provider

actions.name: PutEventStream
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update an event stream for an app

actions.name: PutEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update events for an app

actions.name: RemoveAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the attributes for an app

actions.name: SendMessages
actions.description: Grants permission to send an SMS message or push notification to specific endpoints

actions.name: SendOTPMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to send an OTP code to a user of your application

actions.name: SendUsersMessages
actions.description: Grants permission to send an SMS message or push notification to all endpoints that are associated with a specific user ID

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateAdmChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Amazon Device Messaging (ADM) channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateApnsChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateApnsSandboxChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) sandbox channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateApnsVoipChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) VoIP channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateApnsVoipSandboxChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) VoIP sandbox channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateApplicationSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update the default settings for an app

actions.name: UpdateBaiduChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Baidu channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific campaign

actions.name: UpdateEmailChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the email channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific email template under the same version or generate a new version

actions.name: UpdateEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint or update the information for an endpoint

actions.name: UpdateEndpointsBatch
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update endpoints as a batch operation

actions.name: UpdateGcmChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) or Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) API key that allows to send push notifications to your Android app

actions.name: UpdateInAppTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific in-app message template under the same version or generate a new version

actions.name: UpdateJourney
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific journey

actions.name: UpdateJourneyState
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific journey state

actions.name: UpdatePushTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific push notification template under the same version or generate a new version

actions.name: UpdateRecommenderConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon Pinpoint configuration for a recommender model

actions.name: UpdateSegment
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific segment

actions.name: UpdateSmsChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the SMS channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateSmsTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific sms message template under the same version or generate a new version

actions.name: UpdateTemplateActiveVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to update the active version parameter of a specific template

actions.name: UpdateVoiceChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Voice channel for an app

actions.name: UpdateVoiceTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific voice message template under the same version or generate a new version

actions.name: VerifyOTPMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to check the validity of One-Time Passwords (OTPs)
